mapper.select: SELECT count(*) as cnt, customer_gender as gender FROM sellinfo WHERE CUSTOMER_GENDER = '남' UNION SELECT count(*) as cnt, customer_gender as gender FROM sellinfo WHERE CUSTOMER_GENDER = '여';

SELECT s.drink_id,count(s.drink_id) as sell_cnt , d.drink_name, d.drink_category , d.drink_price FROM sellinfo s , drinks d where CUSTOMER_GENDER='남' and d.drink_id = s.drink_id
GROUP BY drink_id order by sell_cnt desc LIMIT 5;

SELECT s.drink_id,count(s.drink_id) as sell_cnt , d.drink_name, d.drink_category , d.drink_price FROM sellinfo s , drinks d where CUSTOMER_GENDER='여' and d.drink_id = s.drink_id
GROUP BY drink_id order by sell_cnt desc LIMIT 5;

SELECT vending.vending_location , count(vending.vending_location) as cnt FROM sellinfo, vending where sellInfo.vending_id= vending.vending_id
GROUP BY vending.vending_location ORDER BY cnt DESC;

SELECT vending.vending_field , count(vending.vending_location) as cnt FROM sellinfo, vending where sellInfo.vending_id= vending.vending_id
GROUP BY vending.vending_field ORDER BY cnt DESC;
